normalized: and so, another week goes by.
still in the dark about yukikaze and rinko's situation,tatsurou is coming.
led by the slave trader zokuto,i walk toward the buried city.
it has been a month since asagi-sensei asked meto check on yukikaze and rinko's situation.
in the meantime, i studied about yomiharaand mastered hell's dialect.
to avoid suspicion, i'm passing as a slaver myself.
zokuto's apprentice.
i never thought i'd have to turn into a dealer in flesh of all things,but it's for the mission's sake.
more importantly, yukikaze and rinko-ane areapparently masquerading as prostitutes.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （them?
prostitutes?
when asagi-sensei told me, i couldn't believe it.
or rather, i didn't want to.
after infiltrating for so many months as prostitutes, they had to――

name: tatsurou
normalized: （yukikaze and rinko entertaining customers…did they do it?
just thinking about it makes me want to puke.
the two of them, used by men.
i couldn't bring myself to ask asagi-senseito what extent they were "pretending".
i was just too scared of the answer.
what if she had said something like "all the way"?
it's not that unlikely.
for taimanin on a mission, that kind of resolve is needed.
i understand that.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （but, even then…）
for yukikaze, for rinko-ane to spread their legsfor perfect strangers in exchange of a handful of cash,that's not something i want to think about.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （but, if things came to this, then i…）
the closer we get to our destination,the more my anxiety grows.
i'm afraid of meeting with them.
i remember what yukikaze told me 6 months ago,the morning of her departure.

name: yukikaze
normalized: no matter what happens, i'll always belong to you, tatsurou.
don't ever forget that!

name: tatsurou
normalized: （so that's what you meant, yukikaze?
she knew what the mission would entail when she left for yomihara.
she agreed to impersonate a prostitute.
so, was she already ready to be used by men then?

name: tatsurou
normalized: （is that why she acted like that?
rinko-ane's behaviour was also strange.

name: rinko
normalized: tatsurou, i'm sorry but could you take my virginity now?
that's what she told me without warning the evening before.
no matter how you think about it, something was wrong.
she also said something like 『yukikaze will forgive me if i'm second』.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （did she want me, rather than a customer?
no, that's also weird…）
what is their current situation down there?
i have absolutely no inkling.
even though asagi-sensei filled my mind with crucial mission data…
the only thing she said about their status was『confirm it with your own eyes,i don't want to give you preconceived notions』.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （but because of that, my state of mind――）

name: zokuto
normalized: tatsurou.
we're almost there.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh…?
zokuto's sudden call jolts me from my thoughts.
i look up, only to be confronted by yomihara'smassive gates looming over me.

name: zokuto
normalized: man, you had even me fooled, playing the idiot lost in thoughtdeep in hell territory.
guess you're a real big shot, eh, tatsurou?

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah, no…i'm sorry, zokuto-san.
the large man is walking ahead of me.
since i'm pretending to be his apprentice,i pick an adequate tone when speaking to him.
the way he looks at me like i'm some kind of fool bothers me a bit,but on the other hand i'm used to being underestimated.
anyway, worried or not,it's true that i shouldn't be so careless in enemy territory.

name: zokuto
normalized: at this rate, someone's gonna wake up with his throat slit open.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i understand.
bracing myself, i step under yomihara's gates.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze…rinko-ane…
our reunion takes place on the town's central plaza.
seeing them in those getups made me speechless.

name: yukikaze
normalized: t-tatsurou…
i can't believe they'd dress like that outside.
just a tiny bit of fabric over their chest and crotch,and nothing else left to the imagination.
improper" would be too weak a word; they look downright slutty.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （so it was true…they really became prostitutes.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ku…

name: yukikaze
normalized: tatsurou!
why are you making that face!
suddenly, yukikaze is shouting at me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?

name: yukikaze
normalized: don't tell me you started having w-weird thoughtsafter looking at us dressed like this?!
she quickly closes the remaining distance between us,an angry look on her face.

name: tatsurou
normalized: but, those clothes…
i begin to point at her body, and falter.

name: yukikaze
normalized: d-dont point!
and don't just stop talking.
it's really embarrassing!
we're trying hard to stay natural too!

name: tatsurou
normalized: but…

name: yukikaze
normalized: no buts!
you really haven't changed in half a year.

name: yukikaze
normalized: listen!
i'm just going to say this because i feel you'recompletely misunderstanding, but me and rinko-senpaiare absolutely not doing what you're thinking, tatsurou!

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh…？
my apparent surprise earns me a raised eyebrow from yukikaze.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ah!
i knew your mind was in the gutter!
stupid tatsurou.
me and rinko-senpaiare hostesses in one of the city's bars.

name: tatsurou
normalized: hostesses?
eh, hostesses?

name: zokuto
normalized: those two are hostesses, yeah.
what?
you thought they were hookers, tatsurou?

name: tatsurou
normalized: n-no…i never thought of that.

name: yukikaze
normalized: lies.
you definitely thought just that.
i saw it in your eyes.
you're the worst.
yukikaze puffs out her cheeks and looks away from me.
that's what she does when she's really miffed.

name: tatsurou
normalized: but i mean, you did show up dressed like…that.

name: yukikaze
normalized: so what!
do you think we enjoy dressing like this?

name: tatsurou
normalized: no, i didn't say that, but…

name: yukikaze
normalized: but what?
that much is the norm in this town.
that's why me and rinko-senpai are acting as usual.
we're bearing the shame!
for the sake of the mission!

name: tatsurou
normalized: s-sorry…

name: yukikaze
normalized: geez, you really don't understand anything, tatsurou!

name: tatsurou
normalized: …uu

name: rinko
normalized: yukikaze, that much is enough.
rinko-ane interjects with a smile.

name: yukikaze
normalized: but, rinko-senpai, tatsurou clearly lookedlike he lost all faith in us when he saw us.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah, uu…that's…

name: rinko
normalized: tatsurou, like yukikaze said,that's how things stand in this town.
please understand.

name: tatsurou
normalized: y-yeah…

name: rinko
normalized: well, these outfits are certainly revealing.
i'd appreciate if you didn't stare too much.
rinko-ane asks with a shrug.
like yukikaze, i get the feeling she's trying to act normally.
so that she can avoid raising any suspicion from the locals.
anyway, i'm so relieved to find out that they arehostesses in a bar rather than prostitutes.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （even so, damn…）
muttering in my head, i take a good look at both of them again.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （leaving yukikaze aside, with rinko in that getup,a man is running out of places to look…）

name: tatsurou
normalized: （and that's what they call "normal" around here…?

name: yukikaze
normalized: geez!
what do you think you're doingogling rinko-senpai like that, tatsurou!
you perverted brother!
i'm being shouted at again.

name: tatsurou
normalized: y-you're wrong!

name: yukikaze
normalized: liar.
you looked at rinko-senpai in a dirty way.
this is why i hate men.
tatsurou included.

name: tatsurou
normalized: no way…
she's really going overboard.
i mean, even if it's my older sister,how am i supposed to keep cool when she's dressed like that?
on the other hand, that angry yukikaze is the one i know.
i feel stupid for being so worried all the way up until now.

name: rinko
normalized: tatsurou, just ignore that.
yukikaze's frolickingbecause of how long it has been since she could see you.

name: yukikaze
normalized: s-senpai!
i'm not "frolicking"!
yukikaze turns bright red and snaps again, at rinko-ane this time.

name: rinko
normalized: is that so?
i, for one, am glad to meet with tatsurou againafter so long.
do you feel any differently, yukikaze?

name: yukikaze
normalized: th-that's…
yukikaze starts fidgeting, blushing shyly this time.

name: yukikaze
normalized: that's…uu, i'm happy, but, but,this has nothing to with that…when i saw tatsurou,somehow i got mad…

name: rinko
normalized: alright, alright.
after a last smile at yukikaze, rinko's expression turns serious.

name: rinko
normalized: tatsurou, there are a lot of things i'd like to chat about,but for now we're all on duty.
we can't afford idle talk.
we'll discuss while walking.

name: tatsurou
normalized: y-yes.
since having a long talk in the same spot would be fishy,rinko-ane starts strolling through yomihara.
they explain several things to me,such as how they managed to sneak in as hostesses,or the latest pieces of intelligence they gathered.
long story short, everything is under control.
while it almost feels anticlimactic,it was my objective from the start to ascertain it myselfrather than through zokuto's accounts.
this is why asagi-sensei sent me here to begin with.
to make absolutely sure.
once they are done reporting under the guise of chitchatting,we will part.

name: rinko
normalized: tatsurou, i'm sorry we don't have more time.
it's been a whilesince we have been reunited, yet we can't even share a meal.

name: tatsurou
normalized: rinko-ane, we're on duty.

name: rinko
normalized: fu, you're right…good grief,do we have to go back to that stupid hostess sham already?
rinko-ane lets out a very tired sigh.

name: tatsurou
normalized: it suits you surprisingly well though.

name: rinko
normalized: then, want to come as a customer?
i'll give you extra service.

name: tatsurou
normalized: th-that's…

name: rinko
normalized: oh?
such a shame.

name: tatsurou
normalized: oh, you.
we share a good-natured laugh.

name: yukikaze
normalized: well then, tatsurou…
yukikaze sounds reluctant to part.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yeah.
what should i say…do your best.
don't try too hard, though.
a little before, i felt relieved when i learned that they were hostesses,but that's only because that meant they weren't prostitutes.
they're still forced to work in those outfits.
i'm sure they must get lewd remarks all the time,not to mention the occasional groping.
yukikaze must hate that.
did i transmit my feelings properly?
as if to prove it, yukikaze tries her hardest to smile.

name: yukikaze
normalized: thanks.
i don't really feel like it, but i will do my best.

name: rinko
normalized: tatsurou, we'll meet for the next report.
though we don't know when it'll be scheduled.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes, well then, you two.
as i raise my hand in farewell,yukikaze calls out my name.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ah…tatsurou.

name: tatsurou
normalized: hm…?
i look over my shoulder toward yukikaze,but she seems to be hesitating.

name: yukikaze
normalized: n-no…nevermind.
it's nothing.
let's keep focused, tatsurou.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yeah.
we hold each other's gazes for a moment, nod, and finally part.
that was all i needed.
relief spreads through me.
afterwards, i accompanied zokutoon a few errands related to my cover.
albeit a necessity here in yomihara, it's still bitter work.
the eyes of those sold like meat on the marketlay particularly heavy on me.
for them, i'm just another slaver.
i can't help but think again of yukikaze and rinko-ane,and what they must endure for the mission's sake.
once we're done, zokuto and i return to the plaza.

name: zokuto
normalized: kid, i got some of my own stuff to take care of.
i'll go my own way for a bit, we'll meet back up at the hotel.

name: tatsurou
normalized: you mean to act separately?

name: zokuto
normalized: that's what i fucking mean, yeah.
have a meal, have a whore, whatever you like.
as long as you pay cash, this town can make you feel like a king.

name: zokuto
normalized: what's with that face?
having second thoughts about your career?

name: tatsurou
normalized: no…

name: zokuto
normalized: hehe, then bring a little fun into your life.
see ya later.
with a smirk, zokuto gets swallowed by the crowd.
no matter what he said, i'm sure he's up to no good.
still, i have no choice but to stick with him for the time being.

name: tatsurou
normalized: …haa.
after shaking my head, i look around me.
what passes for "night" has fallen on yomihara.

name: tatsurou
normalized: well then, what should i do?
